sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_40d9825d83c5761092e997a6feaad36a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1851077_mock_ski_team</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1851077_mock_ski_team">position=100^EQ<item display_value="Intern" endquery="false" field="position" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="100"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>EDX - The new intern receives all course</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*, gs */ ) {

    // --- Incio das Variveis de Configurao ---
    var tabelaCursos = 'x_1851077_mock_ski_courses'; 
    var tabelaM2M = 'x_1851077_mock_ski_m2m_x_progress';
    var campoM2MEquipe = 'x_1851077_mock_ski_team';
    var campoM2MCurso = tabelaCursos;
    var campoStatusProgress = 'status';
    var valorStatusProgressOpen = '100';
    // --- Fim da Configurao ---

    // Passo 1: Buscar TODOS os cursos.
    var grCurso = new GlideRecord(tabelaCursos);
    grCurso.query();

    // Passo 2: Iterar (fazer um loop) por cada curso encontrado
    while (grCurso.next()) {

        // Passo 3: Preparar o novo registro 'Progress' (var 2)
        var grM2M = new GlideRecord(tabelaM2M);
        grM2M.initialize();

        // Passo 4: Definir os valores (as "ligaes")
        
        // Liga o campo 'Intern' ao Estagirio que acabou de ser criado (o 'current') (var 3)
        grM2M.setValue(campoM2MEquipe, current.getUniqueValue());

        // Liga o campo 'Course' ao curso que encontramos no loop (var 4)
        grM2M.setValue(campoM2MCurso, grCurso.getUniqueValue());

        // Define o status do 'Progress' como 'Open' (vars 5 e 6)
        grM2M.setValue(campoStatusProgress, valorStatusProgressOpen);

        // Passo 5: Inserir o novo registro 'Progress' no banco
        grM2M.insert();
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-05 17:47:27</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>40d9825d83c5761092e997a6feaad36a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EDX - The new intern receives all course</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Mock SkillUp" source="x_1851077_mock_ski">f737f7608309321092e997a6feaad328</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Mock SkillUp">f737f7608309321092e997a6feaad328</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_40d9825d83c5761092e997a6feaad36a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-05 17:47:27</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=40d9825d83c5761092e997a6feaad36a"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1851077_mock_ski_team</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>EDX - User ID matches emai</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

    // Se o campo de e-mail estiver preenchido
    if (!gs.nil(current.email)) {

        // Atualiza o campo de User ID (user_name) com o e-mail
        current.user_name = current.email;

        gs.info(']]><![CDATA[ User ID atualizado com e-mail: ' + current.email);
    }

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_47739478830d321092e997a6feaad30b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1851077_mock_ski.EDXCpfUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>EDXCpfUtils</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var CPFUtils = Class.create();
CPFUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    // Funo para validar CPF
    isValidCPF: function(cpf) {
        cpf = (cpf + '').replace(/[^\d]+/g, '');
        if (cpf.length !== 11 || /^(\d)\1+$/.test(cpf))
            return false;
        
        var soma = 0, resto;
        for (var i = 1; i <= 9; i++)
            soma += parseInt(cpf.substring(i - 1, i)) * (11 - i);
        resto = (soma * 10) % 11;
        if (resto === 10 || resto === 11)
            resto = 0;
        if (resto !== parseInt(cpf.substring(9, 10)))
            return false;

        soma = 0;
        for (var j = 1; j <= 10; j++)
            soma += parseInt(cpf.substring(j - 1, j)) * (12 - j);
        resto = (soma * 10) % 11;
        if (resto === 10 || resto === 11)
            resto = 0;
        if (resto !== parseInt(cpf.substring(10, 11)))
            return false;

        return true;
    },

    type: 'CPFUtils'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-03 19:25:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>47739478830d321092e997a6feaad30b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EDXCpfUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Mock SkillUp" source="x_1851077_mock_ski">f737f7608309321092e997a6feaad328</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Mock SkillUp">f737f7608309321092e997a6feaad328</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_47739478830d321092e997a6feaad30b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-03 19:25:20</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_5697a045834db21092e997a6feaad393
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1851077_mock_ski.EDXImportCourses</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>EDXImportCourses</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var EDXImportCourses = Class.create();
EDXImportCourses.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    run: function() {
        // --- Chamada  REST Message configurada ---
        var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Import Cursos', 'Default GET');
        var response = rest.execute();
        var body = response.getBody();
        var data = JSON.parse(body);

        gs.info("Total de cursos recebidos: " + data.result.length);

        for (var i = 0; i < data.result.length; i++) {
            var curso = data.result[i];

            // Pula registros que no tm nome de treinamento
            if (!curso.u_training) {
                gs.info(" Ignorando curso vazio no ndice " + i);
                continue;
            }

            // Verifica se j existe o mesmo curso (para evitar duplicao)
            var existe = new GlideRecord('x_1851077_mock_ski_courses');
            existe.addQuery('u_training', curso.u_training);
            existe.query();
            if (existe.next()) {
                gs.info("Curso j existe: " + curso.u_training);
                continue;
            }

            // Cria novo registro na tabela local
            var novo = new GlideRecord('x_1851077_mock_ski_courses');
            novo.initialize();

            novo.training = curso.u_training || '';
            novo.order = curso.u_order || '';
            novo.duration = curso.u_duration || '';
            novo.url = curso.u_url || '';

            novo.insert();
        }

        gs.info("Importao concluda: cursos vlidos inseridos na tabela x_1851077_mock_ski_courses");
    },

    type: 'EDXImportCourses'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-04 15:32:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>5697a045834db21092e997a6feaad393</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EDXImportCourses</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Mock SkillUp" source="x_1851077_mock_ski">f737f7608309321092e997a6feaad328</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Mock SkillUp">f737f7608309321092e997a6feaad328</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5697a045834db21092e997a6feaad393</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-04 15:51:09</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_270b92dd8349761092e997a6feaad3e4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1851077_mock_ski_project</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1851077_mock_ski_project">real_budgetVALCHANGESjavascript:global.getCurrencyFilter('x_1851077_mock_ski_project','real_budget', 'USD;USD')^ORestimated_budgetVALCHANGESjavascript:global.getCurrencyFilter('x_1851077_mock_ski_project','estimated_budget', 'USD;USD')^EQ<item endquery="false" field="real_budget" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value="javascript:global.getCurrencyFilter('x_1851077_mock_ski_project','real_budget', 'USD;USD')"/><item endquery="false" field="estimated_budget" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value="javascript:global.getCurrencyFilter('x_1851077_mock_ski_project','estimated_budget', 'USD;USD')"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>EDX - Calculate Differential Budget</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*, gs */ ) {

    var campoEstimado = 'estimated_budget';
    var campoReal = 'real_budget';
    var campoDiferenca = 'budget_difference';

    // 1. Pega os valores dos campos
    var estimado = current.getValue(campoEstimado);
    var real = current.getValue(campoReal);

    // 2. Calcula a diferena
    var diferenca = parseFloat(estimado) - parseFloat(real);

    // 3. Define o valor no campo de Diferena
    current.setValue(campoDiferenca, diferenca);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-05 18:37:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>270b92dd8349761092e997a6feaad3e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EDX - Calculate Differential Budget</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Mock SkillUp" source="x_1851077_mock_ski">f737f7608309321092e997a6feaad328</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Mock SkillUp">f737f7608309321092e997a6feaad328</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_270b92dd8349761092e997a6feaad3e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-05 18:37:07</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=270b92dd8349761092e997a6feaad3e4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1851077_mock_ski_team</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>EDX - CPF Validator</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

    var cpfUtil = new CPFUtils(); // cria instncia da classe

    if (current.cpf && !cpfUtil.isValidCPF(current.cpf)) {
        gs.addErrorMessage('CPF invlido.');
        current.setAbortAction(true); // impede o insert/update
    }

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-03 19:30:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>999458f8830d321092e997a6feaad332</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EDX - CPF Validator</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Mock SkillUp" source="x_1851077_mock_ski">f737f7608309321092e997a6feaad328</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Mock SkillUp">f737f7608309321092e997a6feaad328</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_999458f8830d321092e997a6feaad332</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-03 19:30:37</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=999458f8830d321092e997a6feaad332"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_ca4f484a8305ba1092e997a6feaad319
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1851077_mock_ski_team</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>EDX - Associate Members to Groups</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {

    var userId = current.sys_id;

    // Busca o grupo mapeado para o position atual
    var map = new GlideRecord('x_1851077_mock_ski_position_to_groups');
    map.addQuery('position', current.position.toString());
    map.query();

    if (!map.next())
        return;

    // Insere o grupo diretamente
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
    gr.initialize();
    gr.user = userId;
    gr.group = map.group;
    gr.insert();

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-07 16:35:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ca4f484a8305ba1092e997a6feaad319</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EDX - Associate Members to Groups</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Mock SkillUp" source="x_1851077_mock_ski">f737f7608309321092e997a6feaad328</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Mock SkillUp">f737f7608309321092e997a6feaad328</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ca4f484a8305ba1092e997a6feaad319</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-07 19:24:27</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ca4f484a8305ba1092e997a6feaad319"/></record_update>
